thread.title: Ed Matthews (aka Noise Level, EKM, & Quiet Waves)
thread.title_full: Loopmasters reviewed by Ed Matthews (aka Noise Level, EKM, & Quiet Waves)

author: Ed Matthews (aka Noise Level, EKM, & Quiet Waves)
title: Ed Matthews (aka Noise Level, EKM, & Quiet Waves)
text: I've purchased content from Loopmaster for a few years now, and have find them to be a rich and creative source to develop tracks. I work in dub and dark ambient styles, and find that many of their loops are multi-purpose. Sometimes a single sound gets my creativity started; other times it provides the "icing on the cake."
